SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FP_MEMBER fm , FP_FREEP ff WHERE fm.MB_NO = ff.MB_NO
AND ff.freep_title LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'

SELECT t2.* FROM ( SELECT t1.* , ROWNUM AS rnum FROM( SELECT ff2.* FROM FP_FREEP ff , FP_MEMBER fm , FP_FREEPIMAGE ff2 WHERE ff.MB_NO = fm.MB_NO AND ff.FREEP_NO = ff2.FREEP_NO AND fm.MB_NO = #{mb_no} AND ff2.FREEP_NO = #{freep_no}
AND ff.freep_title LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND ff.freep_content LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
